Module com.dlsc.gemsfx
Package com.dlsc.gemsfx

Class ScreensView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.control.Control
com.dlsc.gemsfx.ScreensView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, javafx.scene.control.Skinnable
public class ScreensView extends javafx.scene.control.Control
A view for displaying the geometry of the currently available screens. This view displays each screen in its correct size. Big screens will be big, small ones will be smaller. In addition, the view can also display the currently showing windows of the application. For debugging purposes the view is also capable of showing arbitrary shapes inside the within the unified bounds of all screens.

      public final javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty showWallpaperProperty
      Determines if the miniature screens should show a wallpaper or not. The wallpapers are controlled via the wallpaperProviderProperty(). If no wallpapers are shown then the appearance of the miniature screens solely depends on CSS.
